text: @JZarif @antonioguterres We people of #Iran inform @antonioguterres that criminal regime of #Mullahs represented by @JZarif have deliberately spread #COVID19 amongst Iranians since January 2020 to suppress #IranProtests and create regional crisis to blackmail world community and UN to put pressure on #US
